# WKInterfaceScrollPosition.bottom

**Case**

The bottom of the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
case bottom
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **WKInterfaceScrollPosition.centeredVertically**: The vertical center of the screen.
- **WKInterfaceScrollPosition.top**: The top of the screen.

items.description: The vertical center of the screen.
